title: Maybe a Christmas Riven?

embed.description: Another character creation for Project Mekanizer with Hazardous "Jon Troy Nickel" "Remi - 7" 3D print has been finished and we're figuring out how many people want to purchase this super limi...

body: All credit goes to Zeronis at DeviantArt!

replies.body:
Sigh.

*unzips
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/209/053/1322529645473.jpg
I don't wear pants with a zipper atm... luckily this picture does nothing for me. Would be too much trouble to pull pants down.
Further proof that Riven players are terrible human beings who just want to get their rocks off with no respect for the actual character.
This troll lmao
Hehe so true.

If there is one thing i dont like about this skin idea would be her sword! if this is suppose to be a holiday skin why not make it a Candy Cane? broken at first then when she activates her Ultimate have it as a full Candy Cane!
Porno riven
That's battle bunny. Literally.
I jizzed.

Just gonna leave this here.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VLnWf1sQkjY

I see those blue and white stripes you bastard.

xD

Perfect holiday outfit, makes me feel both Naughty and Nice...

Now, leave us alone.

To be honest, nearly all of Zeronis' work on Deviantart (save for the concept artworks) aren't related to League, at all.

This being one of those.
So what? o.o

So what?  Other than it not being related to League, thus it's not Riven?  I have no idea...
That doesn't mean we can't make it into a skin...

> That doesn't mean we can't make it into a skin...

Actually, yes is does...

I would love a Christmas Riven!!! :D

I would love Riot to make a Halloween and Christmas skin for Syndra as well. :D

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/1fxb6gcp-winter-syndra
Not bad, but a coupel weeks to late for christmass.

The sword should be a candy cane
or a broken Christmas that gets fixed when she ults
